Reviews.Title: Buen teléfono certificado nuevo lo recomiendo...
Reviews.Author: Jose Lara
Reviews.Content: Este teléfono lo compre con el vendedor Digital Center(Ships From Hong Kong) el teléfono es completamente nuevo estoy muy satisfecho lo recomiendo lo compre para usarlo en Venezuela y funciona con bandas Digitel...

Reviews.Title: Great phone, wrong 3g band
Reviews.Author: zora
Reviews.Content: I received a t-mobile cell phone, which doesn't work with my cell phone company in venezuela (movistar), even though it says clearly in the description that works with "2100/1900/850/800 MHz 3G frequencies", fortunately, another company in venezuela (digitel) works with one of the cell phone's band (800 MHz, band 8) my seller was abe-123, i wrote them and another sellers for information about the 3g bands, but never received any response, i wish they would be more willing to help customers clearing up this important matter. Putting that aside, the cell phone is great, the delivery was fast with no problems.Recibi un celular t-mobile, que no funciona con mi compania en venezuela (movistar), aun cuando dice claramente en la descripcion que trabaja con "2100/1900/850/800 MHz 3G frequencies", afortunadamente otra compania en venezuela (digitel) trabaja con una de las bandas de este celular (800 MHz, banda 8), mi vendedor fue abe-123, les escribi a ellos y a otros vendedores por informacion acerca de las bandas 3g, pero nunca recibi respuesta, desearia que tuvieran mas disposicion a ayudar a los compradores a aclarar este importante asunto. Dejando de lado esto, el telefono es muy bueno, la entrega fue rapida y son problemas.

Reviews.Title: desde venezuela
Reviews.Author: yicce gutierrez
Reviews.Content: buenos dias compre el telefono y me ha ido super bien me acepto mi chip que es de movistar, estoy complacida con el vendedor cumplio con todo.

Reviews.Title: Bold 9780
Reviews.Author: Rocio
Reviews.Content: Recibi celular 9780 el 26 de enero en perfecto estado con el vendedor Blutekusa, es T mobile, el telefono funciona perfectamente en Venezuela, con mi linea movistar,solo le coloque la sim card y listo, recomiendo 100%. No comente antes porque estaba esperando que me lo trajeran a Venezuela. Adicionalmente les comento que funciona con linea 3g en caracas perfectamente!!!

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: kenux20
Reviews.Content: the phone is just exactly what it was described as. it arrived on time and is in great condition. i am enjoying the the phone and the joy is it works back in my country nigeria

Reviews.Title: T-mobile phone
Reviews.Author: Denis Cazaubon "Crapaudsmokeyuhpipe"
Reviews.Content: The initial order got lost in the mail so I was sent a replacement. There is no logo on the handset but as soon as I switched it off, a T-Mobile logo flashed by. I was distraught.

Reviews.Title: My new phone
Reviews.Author: Herms
Reviews.Content: The phone has lived up to my expectations so far. I am still exploring.  I love the voice dialing feature.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: giilmer carrero
Reviews.Content: el producto esta buen estado y llego a venezuela como se ve en la foto referencial gracia buen vendedor lo felicito

Reviews.Title: looks great
Reviews.Author: Li Liang
Reviews.Content: i am a new user to blackberry,just received it a few days ago,it looks great by now,but i am in china and you know,some of the great features are not supported here,anyway,it is great and  worth the price .

Reviews.Title: compra de celular a tienda  LOUNGE CELL INC
Reviews.Author: jose lopez
Reviews.Content: hola soy de venezuela mi celular lo compre como nuevo y me llego usado y de paso con la bateria quemada esta tienda no es nada seria y me siento estafado por ellos LOUNGE CELL INC

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: Rui
Reviews.Content: The keyboard does not work properly, a few months ago broke the screen with a simple fall, is very fragile, and by mistake the phone does not work in the right band 3G (EDGE remains).I will not buy a product Blackberry

Reviews.Title: me engañaron
Reviews.Author: juan mendoza
Reviews.Content: malo. pague por un telefono nuevo y me enviaron uno reformado, decepcionante, al teclado se le borranron las letras muy malo. engaño.

Reviews.Title: Complete Disaster
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I bought this product last year from Cell Lounge INC. and it came in a perfect way, well, at least it seemed to be new. After checking it carefully I realized thay the housing was almost destroyed. Then, I found that it was a manually unlocked T-Mobile branded cellphone and not an OEM unlocked one as it says. Of course the 3G Bands didn't work in Argentina, because T-Mobile bands do not work in Argentina, and it worked only with EDGE. Four months after buying it, the display was broken, I think that was because of the broken housing that caused damage, and of course they didn't pay for it. So, I do not recommend buying it to anybody, after checking with the seller all the conditions of the Item.Cheers, Maria.Compré este producto el año pasado con el vendedor Cell Lounge INC. y parecía estar en buen estado. Después de revisarlo me di cuenta que la carcasa estaba casi destruida y hacía ruidos. Luego, me di cuenta de que era un celular desbloqueado manualmente de la compañía T-Mobile, y no era desbloqueado de fábrica como dice. A todo esto, las bandas 3G no funcionaban en Argentina, porque las de T-Mobile no son compatibles con las locales, por lo tanto lo tuve que usar con la velocidad 2G (EDGE). Cuatro meses después de tenerlo en mis manos, la pantalla LCD se rompió y se puso todo blanco, yo creo que es culpa de la carcasa, que la dañó, y encima no quisieron pagarme ni un centavo. Entonces, la conclusión es que no se lo recomiendo a nadie que lo compre, sin antes chequiar el estado y cada detalle del producto con el vendedor.Saludos, María.

Reviews.Title: not good completely
Reviews.Author: Esteban Payano
Reviews.Content: The keyboard did not work, either the mouse, I had to change those parts for $25.00 plus. The device does not cost what I paid

Reviews.Title: blackberry bold 9780
Reviews.Author: DANIEL ALMONTE
Reviews.Content: blackberry bold 9780 unlocked.I am very happy with my cell phone, blackberry bold 9780 is a good phone and all the best is that it has all the features for which acquired this aparato.fodo works wing perfection and also has no problems connecting wing and network speed 3gb I just need to insert the chip and go.alos therefore encourage buyers to purchase this phone which battery lasts a long time and came to service my address on the agreed date.

Reviews.Title: I will never buy used things again!
Reviews.Author: Gino Jimenez
Reviews.Content: The product received was not the same that the one that I ordered, the one received has the housing broken and is not 3G as described at the amazon product page, I will never buy used things again because for me is a waste of money on trying to send back the product, it's more seasoning than meat.

Reviews.Title: bold9780
Reviews.Author: sandra
Reviews.Content: el telefono llego bien. excelete la entrega. buen estado y con sus accesorios lo estoy comenzando a utilizar. es nuevo

Reviews.Title: Muy bueno 100% recomendable
Reviews.Author: JHOYNER ORELLANA
Reviews.Content: Me gusto mucho las características, funciones y el diseño de este teléfono, lo compré para usar con una linea Digitel y funciono bien. estoy satisfecho con la compra es un buen precio.

Reviews.Title: CLASIFICACION
Reviews.Author: Luisa Mandé Serfaty
Reviews.Content: FUE BUENA COMPRA Y EN UN BUEN TIEMPO DE DESPACHO, EL ARTICULO PRACTICAMENTE NUEVO Y BUEN FUNCIONAMIENTO RECOMIENDO A AMIGOS

Reviews.Title: Good so far
Reviews.Author: Wild 4 u
Reviews.Content: Arrived 3 weeks after shipping however that is a shipping complaint. It is unlocked, as I put my Trinidad and Tobago SIM card and it worked straight away. Downloaded a whole set of Apps from the Blackberry website. Camera quality is excellent. Very neat, easy to use phone with tons of capabilities. Arrived brand new with a charger and software.
